short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly see archives of a page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
See archived versions of an article. 

To use simply click the chrome extension favicon on an article. This will open a new page to search public archives for the article.
